mapper.select: SELECT C.CONFIG_ID AS configId, C.DINING_ID AS diningId, D.DINING_NAME AS diningName, C.MEAL_TYPE AS mealType, C.TIME_SLOT AS timeSlot FROM DINING_TIME_CONFIG C LEFT JOIN DINING D ON C.DINING_ID = D.DINING_ID ORDER BY C.DINING_ID, C.MEAL_TYPE, C.TIME_SLOT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DINING_TIME_CONFIG (CONFIG_ID, DINING_ID, MEAL_TYPE, TIME_SLOT) VALUES (DINING_TIME_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{diningId}, #{mealType}, #{timeSlot})
